meaning_str.bing:
v. 看见；瞄准；发现；给…装瞄准器
n. 视力；情景；视域；风景
adj. 【商业】见票即照付的
网络. 视觉；眼界；景象

看见；瞄准；发现；给…装瞄准器

视力；视觉；景象；情景；风景；名胜；瞄准器；瞄准具；观测器；（尤指不寻常或壮观的）景色；景点；观光地；滑稽可笑（或邋遢、脏乱、讨厌）的人（或物）
看到；观察；瞄准；发现（期待的事物）；辨认出；校准（光学仪器）；对准目标

1.en: The shock of the sight had driven all caution out of him.
1.cn: 他吃惊之下，什么戒备都忘掉了。

2.en: She turned away, for the sight was too much for her to bear.
2.cn: 她不忍目睹这一情景，于是背过脸去。

3.en: KB: Second sight is whereby a mind-control expert can see through somebody else's eyes. And I'm going to try that right now.
3.cn: KB：第二视觉是精神控制专家借助于别人的眼睛来看透东西.并且我现在打算试试。

0.en: If you think M's signing off on that, you're insane. He won't let you out of his sight.
0.cn: 你是疯了才觉得M会同意你去，他不会让你离开他的视线一步。

1.en: I'm sure he is, but you have a large class and he can get lost from sight if you're not looking.
1.cn: 我相信他会的，但是你有这么多学生，他可能在你没有注意到的情况下，就会脱离你的视线的。

2.en: Wrecked his uniform entirely. It was lucky he was dead so he never knew how awful his uniform looked. Get out of my sight.
2.cn: 彻底毁掉他的制服。好彩他死了，所以他从不知他的制服看上去有多糟。离开我的视线。

3.en: A highly complex computational system hiding in plain sight.
3.cn: 一个极度复杂的电脑系统隐于闹市之中。

4.en: And you, a grown man fainting at the sight of a little blood.
4.cn: 还有你，一个成年人，居然看到一点点血就晕倒。

5.en: In brightest day, in darkest night, no evil shall escape my sight.
5.cn: 光明的昼，暗黑的夜，一切罪恶无所遁形。

6.en: Okay. Let us take you off the wall. Out of sight, out of mind. I wish.
6.cn: 好了，我要把你拿下来，眼不见，心不烦，真的就好了。

7.en: Use the sight on the right to aim. Triggers to fire. This is very complicated.
7.cn: 右边的准星用来瞄准，扳柄用来开火。这也太复杂了吧。

8.en: In the butt-tocks, sir. Well, that must be a sight. I'd kinda like to see that.
8.cn: 在屁股上，先生，嗯，那一定很好看，我倒想瞧一瞧。

9.en: I've secured you a ride out of the capital. It's better for you to be out of sight.
9.cn: 我已经安排好你离开国会区了，现在你最好避避风头。

10.en: Welcome. We are gathered here today in the sight of family, friends and Almighty God.
10.cn: 欢迎各位。今日我们齐聚一堂在家人友人，与全能的神的见证下。

11.en: Oh. So what now, you're an art critic? I drew that when I was 5 years old. Get out of my sight.
11.cn: 现在是怎样，你成了艺术家了吗？这幅画可是我五岁的时候画的，别再让我看见你。

12.en: Yeah. Many do, Latin. But my children have been spared sight of me far too long. Take your leave.
12.cn: 多了去了，拉丁人，但是我的孩子们已许久未能见我一面，退下吧。

13.en: Their instruments won't work up here. Missile tracking won't work. They'll have to fire a line of sight.
13.cn: 在那里仪表会失灵，导弹追踪也不管用，他们只能靠肉眼攻击。

14.en: Excuse me. I didn't say forever. Just until the sight of the two of you together doesn't turn my stomach.
14.cn: 失陪一下，我没说永远，只要等我看到你们俩在一起不要让我恶心就好。

15.en: Yeah, I think I've seen one of these. It's a buffalo gun. I'd say 1940s, old-fashioned sight. No crosshairs.
15.cn: 我觉得我见过这种枪，水牛步枪。20世纪40年代的 老式瞄准镜，没有准星。

16.en: They hide in plain sight behind everyday 9:00-to-5:00 cover jobs, luring them into a false sense of security.
16.cn: 他们会大隐于市，拿朝九晚五的日常工作当掩护，慢慢陷入了安全的错觉中。

17.en: We can care deeply, selflessly about those we know, but that empathy rarely extends beyond our line of sight.
17.cn: 我们可以深沉而无私地关心自己的亲人，但是对于那些不认识的人，我们少有付出。

18.en: Ultimately, for full satisfaction, it requires plain sight. Additionally, serial killers are easily profiled.
18.cn: 最终，为了满足感，它得暴露在众目睽睽之下。并且，连环杀手特点突出。

19.en: Oh, no, no, those are... Is that my banjo? When I met this little lady sitting next to me, it was love at first sight.
19.cn: 不，那不是那是我的班卓琴吗？当我遇见身边这位女士的时候，我们一见钟情。
